knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment="#>", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)
library(e1071)
m <- svm(Species ~ ., data = iris, kernel = "radial", cost = 1, gamma = 0.1)
mean(predict(m, iris) == iris$Species)
